reviews.title: Not really free
reviews.comment: Just a phone interface for book of sex. Sure you can create a profile but to get any real use out of the app you have to pay about $100 a year. Plus we all know about half of the profiles on here are scams. My advice if you do install this is to set up a profile and put some other contact info in there. Then wait and hope someone contacts you by those means
reviews.author: steven conroy
